name: Cisco Systems Australia Pty Ltd
description:
Cisco is the worldwide leading provider in developing and supplying communications products and services facilitating and enhancing the scope, quality and types of communication over the Internet.

Cisco has provided content to higher education and schools as part of the Cisco Networking Academy for many years. The content, curriculum and related educational materials are provided free of charge. Cisco is continually developing new content in areas of interest to education, often working in partnership with educational institutions. Naturally, content is limited to areas in which it has recognized expertise. The Cisco Networking Academy is one of many Cisco Corporate Social Responsibility programs http://csr.cisco.com several of which are targeted to education.

For details on the Cisco Networking Academy please visit http://csr.cisco.com/casestudy/networking-academy. The impact of the Networking Academy has been significant. Currently it involves 10,000 Academies (schools and higher education) in 165 countries and has had 4.25 million students in the program. These are often in areas where access to education is a major issue.
